text: 27.63: Mt 12.40 naŋga, 16.21 naŋga, 17.23 naŋga, 20.19 naŋga, Mk 8.31 naŋga, 9.31 naŋga, 10.33-34 naŋga, Lu 9.22 naŋga, 18.31-33 naŋga, Jo 2.19-21Kamata nuŋ ambamu, Aru mɨŋga, ara kru kuyusɨhɨrɨ naŋga hama kɨñɨŋgɨñɨ kuyu mu ambamirɨm indarɨmitarɨŋ. Ambami, Yi arɨkiŋgɨvɨ kɨta, kwɨrɨ hañɨ aŋga yahamɨrɨman, vamba ambami.
